Ingredients.1: 2 small beets, peeled and coarsely grated

Ingredients.3: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, or as needed

Ingredients.12: 2 tablespoons sour cream, or more to taste

Directions.1: Combine beets and vinegar in a small frying pan over low heat. Cook, while stirring, until soft, about 15 minutes.

Directions.2: Heat oil in a large frying pan over low heat while beets are cooking. Add onion and stir for 2 minutes. Add carrots and cook, stirring occasionally, until soft, about 10 minutes. Set aside.

Directions.3: Bring water to a simmer in a large saucepan. Add cabbage and lentils; cook for 10 minutes. Add potatoes and cook for 10 minutes more. Stir in cooked beets and onion-carrot mixture. Season with salt and pepper.

Directions.4: Add tomato paste and simmer until all vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes more. Serve with sour cream and dill.
